name: com.cot.hypernet
description: Share internet access for android mobile phones with a line.

scripts.pack: electron-packager . --electron-version=22.0.0 Cot-Hypernet --win32 --out ./built --app-version 2.1.0 --overwrite --icon bin/icon.png --asar   &&   xcopy bin built\Cot-Hypernet-win32-x64\bin\

author: Cot
